medical_history.chief_complaint: Indeterminate obstructing lung lesion thought to be malignant.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient's symptoms included episodes of asthma and recurrent pneumonia, with a chest radiograph showing minimal lower lobe subsegmental atelectatic changes. The lesion was identified through CT scanning demonstrating a 3-cm mass occluding the left mainstem bronchus.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Smoking 1 pack of cigarettes per day for 16 years; treated for asthma and recurrent pneumonia.
